title: Biotechnology Units / Parks shall be permitted in No Development Zone subject to following condition
clause_text: Biotechnology Units / Parks shall be permitted in No Development Zone subject to following conditions :-
section: Biotechnology Units / Park to be allowed in No Development Zone earmarked in the Development / Regional Plan.
